channel.title: Getting Started on Oakestra
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Oakestra

item.title: Deploy your first Oakestra Cluster
item.description: Oakestra lets you deploy your workload on devices of any size. From a small RasperryPi to a cloud instance far away on GCP or AWS.

item.title: Deploy your first Application
item.description: Requirements You have a running Oakestra deployment. You have at least one Worker Node registered (Optional) If you want the microservices to communicate, you need to have the NetManager installed and properly configured.
